long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ever wanted to have your own pet dinosaur? this extension takes the dinosaur from the no internet page and gives it a new home in your new tab page. whenever you open a new tab you will be met with a dinosaur and all of its needs, if you dont fulfill these needs it will die and you dont want a dead dinosaur on your new tab page now do you? now go get this extension and fulfill your dreams of owning a dinosaur!
